summary: The RTCP Revitalization Act amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to provide mandatory funding from the Commodity Credit Corporation for reimbursement payments to farmers and ranchers facing geographic disadvantages. The bill specifies funding levels for several fiscal years, starting with $10 million in 2026 and increasing annually to $15 million for 2031 and beyond. The bill also modifies payment limitations for recipients of funds.
